title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 May 2012 - XWiki
content:

11:23 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <jvelo\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:28 <jvelo> has quit  
11:28 <jvelo\_> is now known as <jvelo>  
11:50 <sburjan\_> hello everybody  
11:50 <sburjan\_> Denis:  do you have any idea if XWIKI-7791 affects 3.5.1 also ?  
11:50 <sburjan\_> or sdumitriu  
11:54 <+Denis> sburjan\_:  only 4.x  
11:55 <+Denis> very annoying however  
11:55 <sburjan\_> afaik: stats are disabled by default, right ?  
11:55 <+Denis> right  
11:56 <sburjan\_> this is why I missed it :(  
11:56 <+Denis> no  
11:56 <jvipa5g> has quit  
11:56 <+Denis> the issue is only when we gets duplicate ids in existing stats record  
11:57 <+Denis> and this is annoying since there is probably no bugs, just an id collision  
11:58 <sburjan\_> oh, I understand  
11:58 <sburjan\_> I was thinking fixing migrations broke something in stats  
11:58 <+Denis> no, were are just changing where id collision occurs  
12:01 <sburjan\_> so this can prevent the migration of stat, right ?  
12:01 <sburjan\_> just asking to know if someone encounters this how serious it is  
12:07 <+Denis> yes, this prevent migration to succeed  
12:07 <+Denis> deleting offending records solve the issue  
12:08 <+Denis> migration is made to be runnable multiple times  
12:17 <jvdrean> has quit  
12:19 <npm> has quit

15:16 <CIA-74> Jean-Vincent Drean master \* r98185fa https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/98185fad20cef2e2b517f3f119e0224990ca19f5 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/hibernate/query/HqlQueryExecutor.java : XWIKI-7798 : New QueryFilter API allowing to filter query results ...  
15:22 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
15:24 <+fmancinelli> Quick question for maven's mavens :) Imagine you have a dependency without a version. How could you find out in which pom the version has been declared in a dependencyManagement block?  
15:39 <@sdumitriu> fmancinelli: I doubt you can do that automatically  
15:39 <@sdumitriu> Just walk up the parent chain and look in the files  
15:39 <@sdumitriu> If it's about an XWiki project, most likely in the root pom (xwiki-commons/pom.xml)  
15:46 <+tmortagne> fmancinelli: it's pretty easy with m2eclipse  
15:46 <+tmortagne> look at the Dependency Hierarchy tab  
15:47 <+tmortagne> hmm actually not sure  
15:47 <+tmortagne> yes forget that you get where the dependency is declared but not where the version is  
15:48 <+tmortagne> so same as sdumitriu, all I can think of it looking at all parent until you find it  
16:13 <+tmortagne> s/it/is/  
16:26 <CIA-74> Jean-Vincent Drean master \* rb4daa70 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b4daa70bed5b1512280e22412723ec76072ee9c0 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-index/xwiki-platform-index-test/xwiki-platform-index-test-tests/src/test/it/org/xwiki/index.test.ui/AllDocsTest.java : XWIKI-7801 : Filter hidden documents in LiveTable results ...  
16:32 <+fmancinelli> ok, thanks
